data.text:
@ScottGottliebMD There is already one universal Covid vaccine efficacious against all variants: #Covaxin. 300 M doses administered without severe adverse effects. #ApproveCovaxin then further new vaccines!

https://t.co/JChjujmyb6
@ScottGottliebMD Not true for two people here!!!
@ScottGottliebMD Real life data from our family my vaccinated in laws brought it to our home of unvaccinated folks.  3 of the 4 of us caught it.

@ScottGottliebMD My concern about  @CDCgov mask guidance is part of 10x difference between Vax & unVax deaths is the masking & social distancing behavior or Vax'd. Vax'd were 2x more likely to mask according to CMU data. 

Vaccines work (masks help too). https://t.co/jpTp3C9k3L
@atleebreland @heyerin123 @ScottGottliebMD How many shots did you have

@dre_donkey @heyerin123 @ScottGottliebMD Lovely for you, not the case for any of us. Teens had flu symptoms and fever; husband likewise, sick enough to rest in bed. Iâ€™ve got asthma (otherwise healthy) and I was on the edge of needing ER for days. Coughing until I vomit and throat bleeds, fever of 103. Miserable.
